column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Well it was worth the wait for the Tonkotsu spicy! I recommend getting that if you like some spice ! However
column2: JINYA tonkotsu black was alright. I just don't like thin noodles. The meat is soo flavorful and juicy OVERALL
column3: this ramen place is by far the BEST for me!! LOVE the atmosphere and service !
